s3games.ai

Class Heuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.ai.Heuristic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistanceFromGoalHeuristic, MoreStonesHeuristic, Puzzle8Heuristic

    public abstract class Heuristic
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract heuristic class, also contains a constructor method given the heuristic name

    • Method Detail

      • heuristic

        public abstract double heuristic(GameState gameState,
               int forPlayer)
        a heuristic receives the current state and player number - from whose viewpoint the game situation is to be evaluated. A heuristic should return a number that estimates how good the sitation is for the player: in A* this is a lower bound of distance to a goal state, for A* it is a value between -1 (worst=always losing state) and +1 (good=always winning state)
        Parameters:
        gameState - current game state
        forPlayer - current player
        Returns:
        estimated value of the current game state

      • availableHeuristics

        public static java.lang.String[] availableHeuristics(java.lang.String gameName)
        lists all the heuristics available in the system

      • getHeuristic

        public static Heuristic getHeuristic(java.lang.String name,
                     GameSpecification specs)
        constructor method that creates a heuristic of the specified type
        Parameters:
        name - heuristic name
        specs - game specification that is passed to the heuristic constructor if it is needed
        Returns:
        a new instance of the specified heuristic
